formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu diesem AGI-Befehl in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
Usage: CONTROL STREAM FILE <filename> <escape digits> [skipms] [ffchar] [rewchr] [pausechr] Send the given file, allowing playback to be controled by the given digits, if any. Use double quotes for the digits if you wish none to be permitted. Returns 0 if playback completes without a digit being pressed, or the ASCII numerical value of the digit if one was pressed, or -1 on error or if the channel was disconnected. Remember, the file extension must not be included in the filename.
Note: ffchar and rewchar default to * and # respectively.

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.2 zu 1.4:
Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.4 zu 1.6:

para.screen:
--- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -7,3 +7,4 @@ extension must not be included in the filename.
Note: ffchar and rewchar default to * and # respectively. + Runs Dead : No
